  • TheReviewIndex | Unbiased User Review Summaries

    2017-02-18

    The internet is a source of a humongous amount of unstructured content for all sorts of products, in the form of blogs, videos, user and expert reviews, etc. It is almost impossible for anyone to scour all of this disparate data, with contradictory opinions, and thereafter make a correct, or at least optimal, purchase decision.

  • Code Syntax Example

    2017-02-12

    To insert highlight code inside of a post, itâ€™s enough to use some specific tags, has directly described into the Jekyll documentation. In this way the code will be included into a .highlight CSS class and will be highlight according to the syntax.scss file. This is the standard style adopted by Github to highlight the code.
